Package net.hudup.core.evaluate

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DefineMeanMetric
    This interface represents enhanced metric which defines owned mean value.
    EvaluatorListener
    This interface represents a listener for evaluator.
    EvaluatorProgressListener
    This interface represents a listener that monitors the evaluation progress.
    Metric
    In Hudup framework, there are two kinds of result: Recommendation result is represented by the output of method Recommender#estimate(...) or Recommender#recommend(...), which is used for recommendation process.
    MetricValue
    This interface represents value of a metric, called metric value.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMetric
    This abstract class, called abstract metric, implements partially Metric interface.
    Accuracy
    This abstract class represents any metric to evaluate an algorithm.
    ArrayMeanMetricValue
    This abstract class represents an array of mean values.
    ArrayMetric
    This abstract class represents any metric having one internal array for calculate evaluation value such as error range.
    ArrayMetricValue
    This abstract class represents an array of real numbers as a MetricValue.
    DefaultMetric
    Note, the abstract class of Metric interface is {code AbstractMetric}.
    Evaluator
    Evaluator is one of main classes of Hudup framework, which is responsible for executing and evaluation algorithms according to built-in and user-defined metrics.
    EvaluatorConfig
    This class specifies the configuration of an evaluator represented (Evaluator.
    EvaluatorEvent
    This class represents an event fired by evaluator in evaluation process.
    EvaluatorProgressEvent
    This class represents an event for monitoring the progress of evaluation task in evaluator.
    FractionMetricValue
    This abstract class represents fraction (a/b) as a MetricValue.
    HudupRecallMetric  
    MeanMetaMetric
    Meta-metric with mean value.
    MeanMetricValue
    This abstract class represents a average number called mean in form (average) as a MetricValue.
    MetaMetric
    Note, the abstract class of Metric interface is {code AbstractMetric}.
    Metrics
    This Metrics class manages a list of Metric (s).
    MetricWrapper
    Note, the abstract class of Metric interface is {code AbstractMetric}.
    NoneWrapperMetricList
    This class represents a list of metrics with note that these metrics are not wrappers.
    RealArrayMeanMetricValue
    This abstract class represents an array of real mean values.
    RealArrayMetricValue
    This class represents a metric value of one array of real numbers.
    RealMeanMetricValue
    This abstract class represents a real average number.
    RealMetricValue
    This abstract class represents a single number as a MetricValue.
    RealTwoArrayMetricValue
    This class represents a metric value of two arrays of real numbers such as Pearson coefficient and cosine coefficient.
    SetupTimeMetric  
    SpeedMetric  
    TimeMetric
    Currently, two default metrics inherited from DefaultMetric class are TimeMetric class and Accuracy class.
    TwoArrayMetric
    This abstract class represents any metric having two internal arrays for calculate evaluation value such as Pearson correlation.
    TwoArrayMetricValue
    This abstract class represents two arrays of real numbers as a MetricValue.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EvaluatorEvent.Type
    Type of evaluator event.
